name: Bolt
description: A girl named Penny and a dog named Bolt, who has various superpowers, must constantly thwart the evil plans of the nefarious Doctor Calico

name: American Pie
description: Kevin decides to take a stand and defiantly declares that the four will make a pact, to lose their virginity before school prom.

name: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
description: The film centers around an aspiring inventor named Flint Lockwood who develops, following a series of failed experiments, a machine that can convert water into food.

name: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
description: Flint Lockwood and his friends returning to Swallow Falls to save the world after the presumed-destroyed FLDSMDFR reactivates

name: Mean Girls
description: Cady is unprepared for her first day of public high school. Things do not go as planned when Cady falls in love with Regina's ex-boyfriend Aaron.

name: Eyes Wide Shut
description: A doctor becomes obsessed with having a sexual encounter after his wife admits to having sexual fantasies about a man she met

name: Deadpool
description: A mysterious recruiter approaches Wilson and offers him an experimental treatment for his cancer.

name: Airbud
description: High schooler Josh signs up to be the school basketball team's manager and discovers that his pet dog Bud, can play the sport amazingly.

name: Love, Simon
description: Simon Spier keeps a huge secret from his family, his friends and all of his classmates: he's gay.

name: Toy Story
description: Woody, a cowboy doll who belongs to a boy named Andy, sees his position as favorite toy jeopardized when he buys a Buzz Lightyear doll.

name: Chicken Run
description: The plot centres on a group of British anthropomorphic chickens who see an American rooster named Rocky Rhodes as their only hope to escape the farm

name: Fifty Shades of Grey
description: The sensitive and guileless English major, Anastasia Steele, finds herself surrendering to an irresistible force

name: The Terminator
description: A cyborg assassin is sent back through time to 1984 to kill the seemingly innocent Sarah Connor--a significant woman in a bitter future
King Xerxes of Persia amasses an army of hundreds of thousands for the purpose of invading and conquering Greece in 481 B.C.

name: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

name: Annabelle
description: On one horrific night, their home is invaded by members of a satanic cult, who violently attack the couple.

name: That Awkward Moment
description: The commitment-phobic Jason decides on behalf of the group that if Mikey has to be single, they'll all be single together.

name: Joker
description: Forever alone in a crowd, failed comedian Arthur Fleck seeks connection as he walks the streets of Gotham City.
